text: Pieter Gerardus van Katwijk (27 February 1950 â€“ 24 February 2025) was a Dutch cyclist. His career lasted from 1969 to 1983. He competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics and finished in eleventh place in the road race. Van Katwijk died on 24 February 2025, three days before his 75th birthday.Oud-wielerprof Piet van Katwijk overleden: 'Hij was een karaktermens op de fiets' ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Olympians for the Netherlands Category:Dutch cyclists Category:Sportspeople from North Brabant
title: Piet van Katwijk
